name: promise-resolver-queue
description: Provide a queue for series execution of promises
author: Martin Matzanke <https://github.com/mmatzanke>

scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production browserify src/index.js -t babelify --insert-global-vars global -s $npm_package_config_namespace > dist/$npm_package_config_namespace.max.js && uglifyjs dist/$npm_package_config_namespace.max.js -cm > dist/$npm_package_config_namespace.js
scripts.test-all: npm test && npm run lint && npm run build
scripts.preversion: NODE_ENV=production browserify src/index.js -t babelify --insert-global-vars global -s $npm_package_config_namespace > index.js
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && npm publish
